column4: hello, can someone please help me set up a dual monitor in ubuntu 9.04?
what video card?
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=221174
gnea would it be ati radeon 9000?
it's your system, you tell me - open a terminal and type:  lspci | grep VGA
gnea yeah here's the response from the vga line of lspci: ATI Technologies Inc Radeon RV250 [Mobility FireGL 9000] (rev 02)
so you've got a laptop?
gnea, yes dell inspiron 600m
!laptop
hard to say, not sure if it'll do an external monitor at the same time.. does it work in windows?
gnea, yes It did work in xp... however since then I have lost the XP partition
I'm trying to get it to output video through an s-video cable
you can't do dual-monitors using s-video
it would have to be vga or dvi
gnea thanks for the help
do you have the aticonfig tool installed?
gnea no
gnea what's the package name for aticonfig?
iirc, it comes with the fglrx drivers
!ati | weternal
and http://wiki.cchtml.com/index.php/Ubuntu_Feisty_Installation_Guide#Additional_configure_with_aticonfig_tool
it's a bit dated, but should still work to a point
